content: *iota is a crocheted heirloom cardigan berroco * skill level intermediate finished measurements bust closed 30 34-38-42-46-50-54 length 18 1/2 19 - 19 1/2 - 20 - 20 - 20 1/2 - 20 1/2 materials berroco ultra alpaca fine 100 grs 3 3-4-4-5-5-6 hanks #1285 oceanic mix crochet hook size 3 50 mm e or size to obtain gauge five 1/2 buttons gauge 15 chain-1 spaces = 4 14 row = 4 in fillet pat 6 shells = 4 11 row = 4 in shell pat body is worked in one piece to underarms then separated for back and fronts construction schematics are provided
